lateral1Text: My professional objective is to focus on the management, research and development of projects in all sizes, achieving through innovation and teamwork to meet the objectives, quality and expectations expected by people, for this I do not impose limitations regarding the activities to be developed in the professional field and teamwork.

positions.name: Data Scientist Lead
positions.description: Creation of claims and risk underwriting models, allowing to automate 60% of risk assessments automatically, Team leader of 2 data science and 1 data engineer in Chile and Peru.

positions.name: Software Engineer Lead
positions.description: Developed the Artemisa system for management of credit insurance policies for Chile and Peru, developed in Angular 6 and Spring, postgres, AWS and kubernetes. Supporting the management of thousands of daily operations for the complete portfolio of clients, Frontend team leader with 8 developers.

positions.name: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Development of a system for financial guarantees product (SAGR) Chile that manages from the commercial team to the generation of documents, developed in Angular 4, spring, postgres, dockers and AWS. The system allows a 30% reduction in manual operation times, Part of the 4-person team, working on frontend with angular.

positions.name: Assistant Professor
positions.description: Currently I teach classes in Database Design, Database Workshop, Introduction to Python programming and I have some theses in progress, Formerly Logic, Systems Engineering, Computer Structures.

positions.name: Software Engineer
positions.description: Development of a system for prioritizing and classifying emails using PLN with java and angular 2 for BBVA and Banco de Chile, Creation of web scraping of websites like sodimac, homy, ripley and falabella to feed the Impresse search engine using python.

positions.name: Software and research engineer
positions.description: In charge of text processing, topic modeling, text classification processes and analysis of the behavior of messages on Twitter, specializing in pre-processing of messages to obtain as much information as possible in the Spanish language, development with python tools.

positions.name: Software Engineer Intern
positions.description: Development of a system for the generation of video game news for the social network gamerapp and copagamer using Ruby On Rails 4 and Postgresql on AWS.

positions.name: Research Assistant
positions.description: Support in Fondef D09I1185, Scalable Web Observatories in Real Time, Providing tools for document classification and topic models in the Twitter social network using Python.

positions.name: Assistant Professor
positions.description: Information Systems Laboratory for 4th year civil engineering industry students with process and business modeling in Bizagi to improve or solve processes with information systems.

positions.name: Assistant student
positions.description: For the subjects of fundamentals of programming (2/2011), discrete structures (1/2012 to 2/2013), logic and theory of computing (2/2012), fundamentals of computing and programming (2/2013) , database foundations (2/2013 to 1/2015), professional elective entrepreneurship workshop (1/2014).

studiesList.title: Magíster en ingeniería informática
studiesList.description: Thesis: Method of dynamic modeling of topics for the social network Twitter It was focused on the pre-processing of the Tweets generated in the social network Twitter, where the generation of topics is sought dynamically over time, allowing a predictive and global analysis with respect to various calculable indicators using natural language processing. Guide Teacher: Dra. Carolina Bonacic. diploma of academic excellence for performance in the master's program.

studiesList.title: Ingeniería civil informática
studiesList.description: Memory, I am allowed to present the master's thesis as a memory of computer science civil engineering given the complexity of the subject and the part of programming necessary for text pre-processing. Diploma of timely qualification for finishing the degree in the corresponding 6 years.

studiesList.title: Licenciado en Ciencias de la Ingeniería
studiesList.description: This title is delivered to the 4 completed year of the career that has an equivalent in knowledge with any degree delivered by the Universidad de Santiago de Chile.
